body_html:
Thank you very much for your answer. It worked for the first point ! However, on the second point, though I've tried --reload_interval=1 (minimum int value for this var) but it doesn't speed up too much. I still have to push the refresh button thousands of time...
Do you have any other better ways ?

body:
Thank you very much for your answer. It worked for the first point ! However, on the second point, though I've tried --reload_interval=1 (minimum int value for this var) but it doesn't speed up too much. I still have to push the refresh button thousands of time...
Do you have any other better ways ?
